summary: Diff adds a frontend Live deployment config with a hardcoded Live name and validation helper, plus UI branding changes that reference the Live display name. However, there is no evidence in the provided diff summary of the actual Internet Computer “publish to Live/permanent” action (e.g., project rename/deployment configuration changes) being implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current deployed Draft version as a Live (permanent) deployment on the Internet Computer by renaming the project to a valid Live domain name and pushing it live.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only frontend configuration/constants and UI usage/validation. It does not show any deployment/rename/publish changes (such as IC project config, canister/app domain configuration, or release/publish pipeline changes) that would actually push a Draft deployment to Live/permanent.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend-only Live deployment name validation helpers and console warning logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-38 asks to publish/rename/push Live; it does not request adding runtime validation utilities or console warnings in the app.

hallucinated_features.description: UI/branding changes to display a new Live display name across Home/AppShell and update HTML title/description.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-38 focuses on Live deployment publishing and domain naming constraints; it does not request product rebranding or SEO metadata edits.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko code modifications not clearly tied to Live publishing.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals specify not changing backend functionality unless required for Live publishing; the diff indicates backend changes but provides no connection to deployment/publishing.
